name: Rogue Robot Simulator Extreme
description:
Rogue Robot Simulator Extreme Takes you on a adrenaline-filled super robot experience.
Do you like robot games? Want to swing down between buildings? Maybe open your robot wings and fly like an airplane? This game is best for you!
You are free in a world that you can do what you want!

if you're excited to futuristic car games and robot games you will enjoy playing Rogue Robot Simulator Extreme

- Take control of intelligent mech robots
- Dynamic Robot Combat skills
- Stunning Swinging and Flight Physics
- Realistic open environment.
- Beautiful landscapes
- 3 different camera views


"Big Robo", "Cable Robo","Robo Bike and "Rocket Robo" require in-app purchases.
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
